name: llmlb-release
description: Centralized management system for routing LLM inference runtimes across multiple machines.

scripts.build: npm run build:lb && npm run build:xllm && npm run build:mcp
scripts.build:xllm: cd xllm && cmake -B build -S . && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel
scripts.build:xllm:cuda: cd xllm && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_WITH_CUDA=ON && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel
scripts.build:xllm:clean: cd xllm && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel
scripts.build:xllm:ci: cd xllm && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . -DPORTABLE_BUILD=ON && cmake --build build --config Release
scripts.build:xllm:coverage: cd xllm && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_TESTS=ON -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS='--coverage' -DCMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS='--coverage' && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel
scripts.build:xllm:coverage:ci: cd xllm && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -S . -DBUILD_TESTS=ON -DPORTABLE_BUILD=ON -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS='--coverage' -DCMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS='--coverage' && cmake --build build --config Release
